languages.text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса застыло в непроницаемой каменной маске — кажется, словно перед вами изваяние, а не живой человек.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я благодарю за ваше содействие моей миссии. Благодаря Вольному Торговцу фон Валанциус Инквизиция остановила врагов Человечества — на сей раз даже тех, что скрывались в ее собственных рядах. Я более не претендую на ваше время и ресурсы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса застыло в непроницаемой каменной маске — кажется, словно перед вами изваяние, а не живой человек.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я благодарю за ваше содействие моей миссии. Благодаря Вольному Торговцу фон Валанциус Инквизиция остановила врагов Человечества — на сей раз даже тех, что скрывались в ее собственных рядах. Я более не претендую на ваше время и ресурсы".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса застыло в непроницаемой каменной маске — кажется, словно перед вами изваяние, а не живой человек.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я благодарю за ваше содействие моей миссии. Благодаря Вольному Торговцу фон Валанциус Инквизиция остановила врагов Человечества — на сей раз даже тех, что скрывались в ее собственных рядах. Я более не претендую на ваше время и ресурсы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix es una máscara impenetrable, como si contemplases una estatua de piedra en vez de a un hombre de carne y hueso.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Le estoy muy agradecido por ayudarme con mi misión. Gracias {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, la Inquisición ha detenido a los enemigos de la Humanidad, incluso a los que en esta ocasión se ocultaban en su seno. No volveré a reclamar su tiempo ni sus recursos».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix es una máscara impenetrable, como si contemplases una estatua de piedra en vez de a un hombre de carne y hueso.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Le estoy muy agradecido por ayudarme con mi misión. Gracias {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, la Inquisición ha detenido a los enemigos de la Humanidad, incluso a los que en esta ocasión se ocultaban en su seno. No volveré a reclamar su tiempo ni sus recursos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顔は冷たく硬直しており、まるで生きている人間ではなく石像が目の前にいるかのようだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。任務にご尽力いただき感謝する。自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスのおかげで、異端審問庁は庁内にいる人類の敵さえも阻止することができた。今後、あなたの時間や資源を要求するつもりはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顔は冷たく硬直しており、まるで生きている人間ではなく石像が目の前にいるかのようだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。任務にご尽力いただき感謝する。自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスのおかげで、異端審問庁は庁内にいる人類の敵さえも阻止することができた。今後、あなたの時間や資源を要求するつもりはない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希紧绷的脸上看不出任何情绪，仿佛你面前的这个人已经不再是活生生的人，而是一尊石像。{/n}“舰长大人，感谢你的协助。多亏了行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯，审判庭才能在被敌人渗透的情况下，成功阻止人类之敌的邪恶计划。我不会继续占用你的时间和资源了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希紧绷的脸上看不出任何情绪，仿佛你面前的这个人已经不再是活生生的人，而是一尊石像。{/n}“舰长大人，感谢你的协助。多亏了行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯，审判庭才能在被敌人渗透的情况下，成功阻止人类之敌的邪恶计划。我不会继续占用你的时间和资源了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix affiche un masque impénétrable pareil à celui d'une statue de pierre.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous remercie pour l'aide que vous m'avez apportée dans l'accomplissement de ma mission. Grâce {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} von Valancius, l'Inquisition a pu arrêter les ennemis de l'humanité... y compris ceux qui se cachaient en son sein. Je n'abuserai désormais plus de votre temps ou de vos ressources. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix affiche un masque impénétrable pareil à celui d'une statue de pierre.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous remercie pour l'aide que vous m'avez apportée dans l'accomplissement de ma mission. Grâce {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} von Valancius, l'Inquisition a pu arrêter les ennemis de l'humanité... y compris ceux qui se cachaient en son sein. Je n'abuserai désormais plus de votre temps ou de vos ressources. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht ist zu einer undurchdringlichen Maske eingefroren. Es ist, als würdest du eine Steinstatue ansehen, keinen lebenden Mann.{/n} "Lord Captain. Ich danke Euch für Eure Unterstützung bei meiner Mission. Dank {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius konnte die Inquisition die Feinde der Menschheit aufhalten — in diesem Fall auch jene, die sich in unseren eigenen Reihen verborgen hatten. Ich werde Eure Zeit und Eure Ressourcen nicht länger beanspruchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht ist zu einer undurchdringlichen Maske eingefroren. Es ist, als würdest du eine Steinstatue ansehen, keinen lebenden Mann.{/n} "Lord Captain. Ich danke Euch für Eure Unterstützung bei meiner Mission. Dank {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius konnte die Inquisition die Feinde der Menschheit aufhalten — in diesem Fall auch jene, die sich in unseren eigenen Reihen verborgen hatten. Ich werde Eure Zeit und Eure Ressourcen nicht länger beanspruchen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzü kaskatı kesiliyor. Sanki canlı birine değil de taştan bir heykele bakıyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Görevime destek olduğun için teşekkür ediyorum. Hür Tacir von Valancius sayesinde Engizisyon; İnsanlık düşmanlarını durdurmayı, hatta kendi bünyesindeki hainleri bile ayıklamayı başardı. Artık daha fazla vaktini almayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is frozen in an impenetrable mask, as if you were looking at a stone statue, not a living man.{/n} "Lord Captain. I thank you for your assistance with my mission. Thanks to Rogue Trader von Valancius, the Inquisition has stopped the enemies of Humanity — even those hiding in its own ranks, on this occasion. I will no longer be making any claim on your time or resources."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzü kaskatı kesiliyor. Sanki canlı birine değil de taştan bir heykele bakıyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Görevime destek olduğun için teşekkür ediyorum. Hür Tacir von Valancius sayesinde Engizisyon, İnsanlık düşmanlarını durdurmayı, hatta kendi bünyesindeki hainleri bile ayıklamayı başardı. Artık daha fazla vaktini almayacağım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
